extension.title: Gravatar Extension
extension.label: Gravatar
extension.description: This extension allows embedding of Gravatar images.

function.name: gravatar
function.param: Plain email address, or hash of email address. (default: current user email)
Default image. (one of "identicon", "wavatar", "monsterid", or custom image uri; default: gravatar logo)

img.eval:src: uri.appendquery(uri.appendpath('http://www.gravatar.com/avatar', string.contains(hash, '@') ? string.hash(hash) : hash), { s: $size, r: $rating, d: $default })
